title: Senior Software Engineer, AI/ML GenAI, YouTube
description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Write and test product or system development code.
• Collaborate with peers and stakeholders through design and code reviews.
• Design and implement GenAI solutions, leverage ML infrastructure.

REQUIREMENTS:
• Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience.
• 5 years of experience with programming in Python and C++.
• 3 years of experience with ML infrastructure.

KEY TECHNOLOGIES:
• Python and C++ programming.
• GenAI techniques (e.g., LLMs, Multi-Modal, Large Vision Models).
• ML infrastructure (model deployment, model evaluation, optimization).

criteria.name: Industries
criteria.value: Information Services and Technology, Information and Internet

title: Software Engineer, Infrastructure, Play Platform
description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Write product or system development code.
• Participate in or lead design reviews with peers and stakeholders.
• Review code developed by others and provide feedback.

REQUIREMENTS:
• Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience.
• 2 years of experience with software development in Python, C++ or Java.
• 1 year of experience with ML infrastructure.

KEY TECHNOLOGIES:
• Large-scale infrastructure and distributed systems.
• Data structures and algorithms.
• ML infrastructure, including model deployment, evaluation, and data processing.

title: Software Engineer, Embedded Systems, Firmware, Pixel Audio
description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Participate in or lead design reviews with peers and stakeholders.
• Review and provide feedback on code developed by other engineers.
• Triage product or system issues and debug/track/resolve them.

REQUIREMENTS:
• Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience.
• 2 years of experience with software development in C or C++.
• 2 years of experience with embedded operating systems.

KEY TECHNOLOGIES:
• C or C++ programming languages.
• Embedded operating systems.
• Performance, systems data analysis, visualization tools, or debugging.

• 1 year of experience with ML infrastructure and GenAI techniques.

• Generative AI techniques and related concepts.

title: Software Engineer Tech Lead, Machine learning, YouTube Notifications
description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Drive notification-initiated visits and timeliness for a positive user experience.
• Improve timing, frequency, and content of notifications through ML applications.
• Develop and optimize ML models, analyze user and system behaviors.

REQUIREMENTS:
• Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience.
• 8 years of experience in software development, 5 years in testing and launching software products.
• 3 years of experience with software design and architecture.

KEY TECHNOLOGIES:
• Machine Learning (ML) design and ML infrastructure.
• Data Processing and Analysis, Recommender Systems, Personalization, A/B Testing.
• Familiarity with Google/YouTube ML infrastructure.

title: Software Engineer, Computational Photo/Videography
description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Develop CV/ML algorithms for imaging/video pipelines.
• Develop robust tools for benchmarking and characterizing image and video quality.
• Prototype and evaluate research papers in computational photography, computer vision, graphics, and machine learning/gen ai.

REQUIREMENTS:
• Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience.
• 5 years of experience in computational photography/computer vision.
• 2 years of experience with software development in one or more programming languages.

KEY TECHNOLOGIES:
• Optimization algorithm performance by GPU, NEON, Halide, DSP, etc.
• C/C++ build systems and tooling.
• Experience with low compute or power constrained Android devices.

criteria.name: Industries
criteria.value: Information Services and Technology, Information and Internet
